Summary: ufo disc hovering over new york harbor
divs: Sighting Detailssince june 20th ive been seeing and photographing a ufo disc shaped object in broad daylight. it started while i was in my backyard smoking a cigarette when i got a strange but powerful urge to look up and i saw something silvery moving through the clouds then i decided to take a few pictures and in one of the pics there it was i thought at first it could have been a bird so i take more pics this time i made sure the sky was clear when a plane was passing by i took a couple of pics, clearly all i saw was the plane but going back to the pic i saw a second object next to the plane and i zoom and see it is clearly a disc, this continued and still happens i also had many sightings where i would see it and take pictures but there would be nothing i have about 60 photos and 170 sightings. jan 18 2012 i observed this disc hovering over new york harbor and on jan 24 2012 i was in central park and i got the same strange powerful urge to take pictures and i did not see the object only when i looked at the picture there it was
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 3 other sightings in New York on or around January 18th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
